trans-unit.source: Try Azure RemoteApp on your device in 3 minutes or less
trans-unit.target: Try Azure RemoteApp on your device in 3 minutes or less

trans-unit.source: Test drive Azure RemoteApp functionality without installing the service.
trans-unit.target: Test drive Azure RemoteApp functionality without installing the service.

trans-unit.source: Try Azure RemoteApp on your device in 3 minutes or less
trans-unit.target: Try Azure RemoteApp on your device in 3 minutes or less

trans-unit.source: Want to see Azure RemoteApp on your device?
trans-unit.target: Want to see Azure RemoteApp on your device?

trans-unit.source: You can access our demo deployment for 10 minutes, as long as you have a Microsoft account.
trans-unit.target: You can access our demo deployment for 10 minutes, as long as you have a Microsoft account.

trans-unit.source: We have Office and a few other applications available.
trans-unit.target: We have Office and a few other applications available.

trans-unit.source: This is a great way to test drive the user experience for Azure RemoteApp in less than 3 minutes.
trans-unit.target: This is a great way to test drive the user experience for Azure RemoteApp in less than 3 minutes.

trans-unit.source: Interested?
trans-unit.target: Interested?

trans-unit.source: Go to to [http://remoteapp.azure.com](http://remoteapp.azure.com).
trans-unit.target: Go to to [http://remoteapp.azure.com](http://remoteapp.azure.com).

trans-unit.source: Click **Install Client** in the upper right corner.
trans-unit.target: Click **Install Client** in the upper right corner.

trans-unit.source: The system automatically detects your device and will take you to the client for your device.
trans-unit.target: The system automatically detects your device and will take you to the client for your device.

trans-unit.source: Install the client.
trans-unit.target: Install the client.

trans-unit.source: Go back [http://remoteapp.azure.com](http://remoteapp.azure.com) and sign in with your Microsoft account.
trans-unit.target: Go back [http://remoteapp.azure.com](http://remoteapp.azure.com) and sign in with your Microsoft account.

trans-unit.source: You can now access applications running in real time on Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: You can now access applications running in real time on Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Your opinion matters.
trans-unit.target: Your opinion matters.

trans-unit.source: At the end of each session, you will see a dialog box for your feedback.
trans-unit.target: At the end of each session, you will see a dialog box for your feedback.

trans-unit.source: If you have a minute, tell us your thoughts and let us know whether you would like Microsoft to contact you for additional information.
trans-unit.target: If you have a minute, tell us your thoughts and let us know whether you would like Microsoft to contact you for additional information.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] Because this is a controlled environment for demo use, we have not enabled external internet access from the published demo applications.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] Because this is a controlled environment for demo use, we have not enabled external internet access from the published demo applications.

trans-unit.source: Because of this, services like OneDrive are not accessible.
trans-unit.target: Because of this, services like OneDrive are not accessible.

trans-unit.source: Also, clipboard sharing (Copy & Paste) and USB and printer redirection are disabled.
trans-unit.target: Also, clipboard sharing (Copy & Paste) and USB and printer redirection are disabled.
